item.description:
OUTING ANNOUNCEMENT

WHEN: 2 hours starting at the posted time

WHERE TO MEET: At the posted time, with 1/2 hour leeway for late-comers.

OTHER:
IF LOST: If you become lost getting there, call.

MEDIA: Unless you are accustomed to painting indoors in crowded conditions, it is recommended you stick to dry and/or simple media. Oils are not recommended because of their residue and fumes.

Michael Emerald
617/968-0627
westpointusma@yahoo.com
item.how_to_find_us: Take route 3S, exit 6 to historic plymouth. Right off the ramp, go straight to main street. Take a right on Main. Kissaggee is on the right, just before the lights at the end of town. Parking can easily be found by taking a right at the lights.
item.why: This is a very eclectic coffee shop! Live folk music! Lots of art on the walls! Home-roasted coffee! However, tables are small so come with a limited set-up.
item.name: INDOOR PAINTING: Kissagee Coffee Shop, Plymouth, MA
